Class PileOfBones

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.enemies.Enemy
game.enemies.Undead
game.enemies.PileOfBones
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Despawnable, Resettable, Spawnable
public class PileOfBones extends Undead implements Spawnable, Despawnable
A class that represents the Pile of Bones the Undead turn into. Inherits from Undead. Created by:
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bryan Wong Modified by:

  • Constructor Details

    • PileOfBones

      public PileOfBones(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor resurrectableEnemy, int turnsToResurrect)
      PileOfBones Constructor. Calls parent class to set inherited data attributes. Sets despawning chance to be 0% as Pile of Bones cannot despawn.
      Parameters:
      resurrectableEnemy - : The resurrectableEnemy that turned into the Pile of Bones, ready to resurrect after 3 turns.
      turnsToResurrect - : The number of turns it takes to ressurect the Undead again.

  • Method Details

    • getRESURRECTABLE_ENEMY

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor getRESURRECTABLE_ENEMY()
      A method to return the RESURRECTABLE_ENEMY data attribute.
      Returns:
      the RESURRECTABLE_ENEMY instance.

    • getTurnsToResurrect

      public int getTurnsToResurrect()
      A method to return the turnsToResurrect data attribute.
      Returns:
      the number of turns before the Undead resurrects.

    • setTurnsToResurrect

      public void setTurnsToResurrect(int turnsToResurrect)
      A method to set the turnsToResurrect data attribute.
      Parameters:
      turnsToResurrect - : The number of turns before the Undead resurrects.

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Display display)
      At each turn, decrement the turnsToResurrect by one. Then at turnsToResurrect == 0, call the .spawn() and despawn() method to resurrrect the Undead from a Pile of Bones.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      actions - : Collection of possible Actions for this Enemy.
      lastAction - : The Action this Enemy took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction().
      map - : The map containing the Enemy.
      display - : The I/O object to which messages may be written.
      Returns:
      the valid action that can be performed in that iteration or null if no valid action is found.

    • spawn

      public void spawn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location location)
      A method to resurrect the Undead by spawning it back into the map. Will only spawn once the turnsToResurrect becomes 0.
      Specified by:
      spawn in interface Spawnable
      Parameters:
      location - : The location of the Ground to spawn the Undead.

    • despawn

      public boolean despawn()
      Despawn the PileOfBones before resurrecting the Undead Enemy.
      Specified by:
      despawn in interface Despawnable
      Overrides:
      despawn in class Enemy
      Returns:
      true always as PileOfBones will be removed from the map before resurrection.
